verse: मधुरमधुरमेतन्मंगलं मंगलानां सकलनिगमवल्लीसत्फलं चित्स्वरूपम् । सकृदपि परिगीतं श्रद्धया हेलया वा भृगुवरनरमात्रं तारयेत्कृष्णनाम ॥
overall_meaning: The very sweet and auspicious name of Krishna, which is the fruit-bearing cluster of all auspicious things in the scriptures and the nature of consciousness, can liberate even an ordinary person if sung once with devotion or casually, by the best among the wise.
